footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Constellations: Kamisato Ayaka

fields.name: Snowswept Sakura (C1)
fields.value: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

fields.name: Blizzard Blade Seki no To (C2)
fields.value: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

fields.name: Frostbloom Kamifubuki (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Ebb and Flow (C4)
fields.value: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

fields.name: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Dance of Suigetsu (C6)
fields.value: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
